name: Mr. Jumpington 4
description:
This is a game of adventures and big jumps! Jump along all the platforms to complete the entire challenge, but be careful not to jump to conclusions. Get it?

This is the fourth and probably final game in the Mr. Jumpington series. Jumpier than ever!

Mr. Jumpington is a jumping hero and an adventurer exploring caves and looking for golden coins. This is a game where you control him while jumping through different caves and your goal in every level is to collect all the coins. Your movement is jumping, jumping and only jumping. Move one square at a time and beware of enemies and traps. Explore all caves in all levels and make Mr. Jumpington a true adventurer!
